title: How to only use incoming server, no outgoing
creator: csmyarrumbak
content: Hi all, my organization has disabled SMPT and so I cannot send emails from thunderbird, but I'd still like to receive them through it, but when I go to add an account, I have to add an outgoing server. Is there a way to skip this step?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:134.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/134.0

title: While viewing individual mails, swipe down to return to inbox feature request
creator: JonNc
content:
Hello,

Is this something that could be added in the future?
